title: Looking for new seedboxes
body:
My current seedbox provider turned to shiiiiiiiiet, so now I’m looking for a new one. I’ve found some good stuff, but maybe you know better and (which would be very cool) can provide me one for free? 🙂

What am I looking for?

Truly unlimited traffic (upload included), great upload speed, good perfomance (up to 100 torrents at super-seed mode), stable, accepting bitcoins.

If you have something to say in private – use PM’s on my contacts page.

Thanks in advance.
